pitch.cc: Zach Duke is really trying to keep Ryan Braun close; he is 12-for-14 in stolen base attempts this season.
That was pitch number 45 for Zach Duke; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .265 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .382 off him after that.
